title: AvantGandhi
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104005124im_/http:/typophile.com/files/avantgandhi.jpg)

'AvantGandhi' tShirt Design by [Emil Kozak](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104005124/http:/www.emilkozak.com/), Barcelona, España..

_( Be sure to take a closer look at [www.emilkozak.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104005124/http:/www.emilkozak.com/), for more fine design and art works by this talented fellow.. Niiice.. Respect.. )_
author: Dav

comments.content: I am going to get a tshirt from this fellow I think. Just waiting on prices. Cool link!

Just for the record I wasn't getting the shirt pictured on the thread. I found another I fancy.

I wrote to Emil & asked him to talk to the danish shirt co. Then they wrote to me. I suggest you write to Emil too. Or you could contact the shirt company by following the link from Emil's site.
